sources.title: Thunder in the Desert (1938) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Louise Stanley, Don Barclay
Director: Sam Newfield

A cowboy sets out to find the leader of an outlaw gang that murdered his uncle.

metadata.Plot: Bob arrives looking for the killer of his uncle. When the Sheriff chases him and his partner Rusty, Reno thinks they are the men he is looking for and takes them into his gang. There Bob finds his uncle's gun and knows he has found the right gang. However he realizes the gang has an unknown leader and he sets out to find him.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Louise Stanley, Don Barclay
